Class Remove

When button is clicked, it will set fixed specified html to the target

<button type="button"
    data-as='{
        "click": {
            "class.remove": {
                "target": "#b",
                "class": "selected"
            }
        }
    }'
>Remove class 'selected' on #b</button>

<ul>
    <li id="a" class="selected">A</li>
    <li id="b" class="selected">B</li>
    <li id="c" class="selected">C</li>
</ul>
